title: Whitewater...and the winning combination
brief_description: The film uses a champion kayaker facing the rapids of the Colorado River to show how an individual must find his own winning combination to face the challenge and succeed in any field. A motivational film.
description: The film uses a champion kayaker facing the rapids of the Colorado River to show how an individual must find his own winning combination to face the challenge and succeed in any field. A motivational film.
